rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective from the specified list.
The segment provides factual economic data using neutral language.
The segment discusses export percentage and industry use (financial/trade metrics), which are treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports economic/industry status but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
